pageContext.claim: “Look at his voting. It's the same voting as Schumer, Nancy Pelosi, and the legendary Maxine.”
pageContext.analysis: Tester has voted with Trump 36.8 percent of the time, according to FiveThirtyEight. He has voted to confirm several of the president’s Cabinet officials and has supported major pieces of legislation Trump supported including a rollback of some Dodd-Frank regulations and expanding private care options for veterans. Charles E. Schumer (D-N.Y.), by contrast, has voted with Trump 25 percent of time while Pelosi and Waters have voted with Trump 20 percent and 10.1 percent, respectively.
